subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
organizations: Harris Farms Horse Division of Harris Rach Beef Co
lead_paragraph: The connections behind California Chrome’s run at the Triple Crown have one thing in common: They all fell hard for him in their own way.
snippet: The connections behind California Chrome’s run at the Triple Crown have one thing in common: They all fell hard for him in their own way.
